mapper.select: SELECT 蔵書.蔵書コード as "itemNumber.value", 本.本ID as "book.bookNumber.value", 本.タイトル as "book.title.value", 本.著者 as "book.author.value", 本.本種別 as "book.bookType" FROM 蔵書 INNER JOIN 本 on (蔵書.本ID = 本.本ID) WHERE 蔵書.蔵書コード = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 貸出可能(蔵書コード) VALUES (#{value})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM 貸出可能 WHERE 蔵書コード = #{value}
